author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Hillary Clinton Pressed False Benghazi Video Narrative, Told Egyptian PM It Was An Attack | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
Hillary Clinton was grilled at the Select Committee on Benghazi hearing by Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) for running with the video narrative as being what prompted the attack that killed 4 Americans, and not that it was a planned attack by Islamists.
Jordan showed a slide of an email from Clinton to family members telling them that the attack was indeed a terrorist attack, as well as showing a slide of another email to the Egyptian PM, telling him that the attack was not caused by video.
Minutes after her email to the Egyptian PM, Clintonâ€™s press shop press forward with the video narrative.
Clinton told Jordan and the committee that she did not blame the attack on the video, but she did. She lied.
